attributes.action: Working parents should be entitled to free school meals and vouchers
attributes.additional_details: All children should be entitled to free school meals and food vouchers regardless of wether the parents are working or not .. working parents are hard done to. We pay full rent , full council tax whilst you only pay 80 percent of wages on furlough .. yet we can’t get free meals for the children... people on benefits get everything! Free money, rent , council tax and now free meals. Sort it out boris
attributes.background: Working parents need free school meals and vouchers too. We struggle to make ends meet yet people in benefits get free money , rent paid , council tax paid and now free school meals and vouchers!!! Meanwhile we were surviving on 80 percent of wages due to furlough, still paying full rent and CTax.
